Title: Victory belongs to peace and socialism
Designer: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 5 and 1 refer to May 1, Labor Day. The image of the flying 'bucket' and the searchlights is from the 1958 poster 'Cheer for overfulfilling the quota of 10.700.000 tons of steel' by Lu Xingchen and Shen Lin, who may have been involved with this design as well.
